name: Crying Your Name Across this Endless Sky. When My Tears Dry and Your Heart Dies; Even If Fate Stops Me, I Will Find You.
name_original: Crying Your Name Across this Endless Sky. When My Tears Dry and Your Heart Dies; Even If Fate Stops Me, I Will Find You.
description:
Without you what should we live for?

Without freedom what should I live for?

When fate forever binds us, how will we find each other?
